title: Confidential virtual machine
shortDescription: All the features of trusted virtual machine and more with added hardware-guaranteed confidentiality.
activationString: Click to view details of the Solution
detailsDescription: See more contextual details about what happens with this solution and why this is useful and why a user should use it.
learnMoreLinkText: Learn more about Azure Spot instances

highlights.content: Virtual machine memory encryption with integrity protection, where encryption key is protected by hardware and out of reach of sofware.
Full OS disk encryption with keys sealed to vTPM, and optional cloud-based pre-encryption before the VM is provisioned.
Secure Boot: ensures that the machine boots using only trusted software.
Customizable attestation policies to ensure the host's compliance before deployment.
